Mary Bell no Hi no Youjin: Guratto Kitar: A fire safety short starring the Hana no Mahoutsukai Mary Bell cast. It specifically focuses on fires that start because of an earthquake and what a child should do in such a situation when they may be trapped in a building. The short was re-released on the Hana no Mahoutsukai Mary Bell DVD-Box Set in 2009.
['Hana no Mahoutsukai Mary Bell', 'Mary Bell no Koutsuu Anzen']
